item.title: Madhusudan Kela Portfolio: Fresh Rs 965 cr investment in 2 stocks – One in a recently listed solar firm and another small-cap bet - ET Now
item.description:
Madhusudan Kela Portfolio: Fresh Rs 965 cr investment in 2 stocks – One in a recently listed solar firm and another small-cap bet

Updated: Jan 18, 2025 22:36 IST

Investor Madhusudan Kela has made significant investments worth Rs 965 crore in two stocks during the quarter ended December 31, 2024, boosting his portfolio to a total value of Rs 1,414.3 crore.

  • Kela has invested in Waaree Energies Limited, India's largest manufacturer of solar PV modules, purchasing 33,41,700 equity shares, a 1.16% stake for Rs 870.6 crore.
  • The shares of Waaree Energies debuted at a premium of 66.3% over their IPO price.
  • Kela's second investment is in Indostar Capital Finance Ltd, acquiring about 3,379,834 shares representing a 2.48% stake, valued at Rs 94.5 crore.
“Shares of Indostar Capital Finance Ltd. have given a return of 38.97% in the past year.”

This latest move reflects Kela's strategic focus on the renewable energy sector and small-cap investments.

item.title: Narayana Murthy’s family wealth takes a ₹1,850-crore hit as Infosys shares plunge 6% - Mint
item.description:
Narayana Murthy’s Family Wealth Takes a ₹1,850-Crore Hit as Infosys Shares Plunge 6%

Date: Not specified Source: LiveMint

Infosys Ltd co-founder NR Narayana Murthy’s family wealth suffered a loss of ₹1,850 crore due to a nearly 6 percent decline in share price of India's second largest IT services company on Friday.

  • The Murthy family's stake in Infosys is now valued at about ₹30,300 crore, down from ₹32,152 crore.
  • The family owns a combined 4.02 percent stake in Infosys, with individual holdings including Narayana Murthy (0.40%), Sudha Murty (0.92%), Rohan Murty (1.62%), and Akshata Murty (1.04%).
  • The Infosys share price declined by 5.77% to ₹1,815.10 on BSE, impacting broader market indices.
  • Despite the decline, Infosys reported an 11.46% rise in net profit in Q3, raised its revenue growth forecast, and cited increased demand in financial services and retail sectors.
“What we are seeing is a clear change in the discretionary activity in financial services, in retail and consumer products, which gives us good confidence.” - Salil Parekh, CEO of Infosys

In conclusion, the Murthy family's wealth has been significantly affected by the recent drop in Infosys' stock price despite the company’s strong earnings report.

item.title: Stock Market Next Week: Trump’s swearing-in ceremony, Nifty weekly expiry, IREDA fund raise among key cues to watch - ET Now
item.description:
Stock Market Next Week: Key Cues to Watch Including Trump's Swearing-In Ceremony

Updated: January 18, 2025, Source: ET NOW

The Indian equity market is expected to remain cautious in the upcoming week following persistent selling by FIIs and mixed corporate earnings. Key events include the swearing-in ceremony of Donald Trump and the Nifty weekly expiry.

  • The Indian equity market continued a consolidation phase with selling pressure and a rise in crude oil prices.
  • Experts predict a cautious market tone due to domestic and global factors.
  • Nifty will test the 22,700 level, with support at 22,900.
“The swearing-in ceremony of Donald Trump on January 20 is expected to draw significant attention, especially for any initial announcements on trade tariffs.” - Ajit, Religare

Several corporate actions, global economic indicators, and events such as HSBC PMI and consumer confidence reports will be watched closely next week.

item.title: $TRUMP meme coin rakes in billions ahead of Donald Trump’s inauguration, spikes over 300% within hours after launch - Mint
item.description:
$TRUMP Meme Coin Surges 300% on Launch Ahead of Trump's Inauguration

Publication Date: January 18, 2025 | Source: Live Mint

The cryptocurrency market saw an explosive rally with the launch of the $TRUMP meme coin, which experienced a surge of over 300% just hours after its debut.

  • The $TRUMP meme coin debuted with a market capitalization of $14.5 billion.
  • Trading volumes exceeded $1 billion shortly after launch.
  • Price rose from an initial $0.18 to $7.1 shortly after.
  • Donald Trump introduced the coin on social media, inviting investors to join his community.
  • The coin was developed on the Solana blockchain with an initial supply of 200 million tokens.
"My NEW Official Trump Meme is HERE! It’s time to celebrate everything we stand for: WINNING! Join my very special Trump Community. GET YOUR $TRUMP NOW. Go to http://gettrumpmemes.com — Have Fun!" — Donald J. Trump

This launch highlights the significant interest in cryptocurrency driven by political events and figures.

item.title: $TRUMP meme coin skyrockets 300% in under three hours on explosive debut ahead of Donald Trump’s inauguration - Mint
item.description:
$TRUMP meme coin rakes in billions ahead of Donald Trump’s inauguration; spikes massive 300% within hours after launch

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Live Mint

Donald Trump launched the $TRUMP meme coin days before his inauguration, achieving an $8 billion market cap and a 300% increase in value shortly after launch.

  • The $TRUMP coin surged to a price of $7.1 from an initial $0.18.
  • Trading volumes approached $1 billion in under three hours.
  • Trump marketed the coin as his “official Trump meme” through posts on X and Truth Social.
  • The coin experienced a rapid rise, hitting a peak market cap of $7.7 billion shortly after launch.
  • 200 million tokens were created for the launch, with plans for a total supply of 1 billion over three years.
“My NEW Official Trump Meme is HERE! It's time to celebrate everything we stand for: WINNING!”

The rapid success of the $TRUMP token reflects significant interest in cryptocurrency and meme coins, particularly tied to pop culture figures.

item.title: Donald Trump's new $TRUMP meme coin records 220% increase within hours - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Donald Trump's $TRUMP Meme Coin Sees 220% Surge in Hours

Date: January 18, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Ahead of his inauguration, Donald Trump has launched a new meme coin, $TRUMP, causing a stir in the cryptocurrency market.

  • The token was launched on the Solana network and aimed to engage Trump's supporter base on social media.
  • The $TRUMP coin's market cap soared by 220%, reaching $4.25 billion shortly after its launch.
  • Trading volumes for the coin approached $1 billion; it shot up from an initial price of $0.18 to $7.1.
  • Trump has expressed intentions to implement cryptocurrency-friendly policies during his upcoming term.
“It’s time to celebrate everything we stand for: WINNING! Join my very special Trump Community. GET YOUR $TRUMP NOW.” - Donald Trump

This launch has sparked significant interest in cryptocurrency ahead of Trump's second term, potentially indicating upcoming regulation changes.

item.title: EPFO members can now change personal details, transfer EPF online themselves - Moneycontrol
item.description:
EPFO Members Can Now Manage Personal Details Online

Date: January 18, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

Retirement fund body EPFO has introduced two new facilities allowing over 7.6 crore members to change personal details and transfer EPF online without employer intervention.

  • Members can change their name and date of birth online without needing verification from employers.
  • EPF transfer claims can be filed online using Aadhaar OTP for those with e-KYC EPF accounts.
  • Union Labour & Employment Minister Mansukh Mandaviya highlighted that the previous lengthy process for updating information has been simplified.
  • 27% of grievances related to member profile/KYC issues are expected to decrease with these new services.
  • The EPFO has made it easier to self-correct common errors in personal details.
"Now many improvements have been made in this... you can make the necessary changes in your information given in EPFO by going to the digital platform yourself without any intervention." - Mansukh Mandaviya

This new online facility enhances the user experience for EPFO members, making it easier for them to manage their personal details and EPF transfers efficiently.

item.title: TRAI Rule: How many days will Jio, Airtel, Vi and BSNL SIMs work without recharge? - India TV News
item.description:
TRAI Rule: SIM Validity Without Recharge for Jio, Airtel, Vi, and BSNL

Publication Date: January 17, 2025 Source: India TV News

The Telecom Regulatory Authority of India (TRAI) has introduced rules to extend the validity of SIM cards for Jio, Airtel, Vi, and BSNL subscribers, allowing users to manage their recharges more effectively.

  • Jio SIM cards remain active for 90 days without recharge.
  • Airtel SIM cards will be active for 60 days without recharge.
  • Vi users also enjoy a 90-day grace period without recharge.
  • BSNL offers the longest validity of 180 days without recharge.
“These new rules simplify SIM management and help users plan recharges efficiently.”

In conclusion, these guidelines from TRAI provide significant relief to mobile users, reducing unnecessary expenses and simplifying the management of SIM cards.

item.title: Adani Energy Solutions Q3 Results FY 2025 date, time: Adani Group firm’s quarterly earnings announcement, conference call schedule - ET Now
item.description:
Adani Energy Solutions Q3 Results FY 2025 Announcement Schedule

Date: January 18, 2025 | Source: ET NOW

Adani Energy Solutions is set to announce its Q3 FY25 earnings on January 23, 2025. A post-results conference call is scheduled for January 24, 2025.

  • The Board of Directors meeting is planned for January 23, 2025, to approve the unaudited financial results.
  • AESL reported a significant growth in its previous Q2 results, with net profit rising by 145%.
  • On January 18, AESL's stock closed at Rs 805.65, a 1.69% increase from the previous close.
“...we would like to inform that the Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Thursday, 23rd January, 2025 inter-alia to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2024,”

Adani Energy Solutions continues to show a positive trend in its financial performance with increasing revenues and profits.

item.title: Big Loss for Narayana Murthy! Infosys Stock Slide Erodes Family Wealth By Rs 1,850 Crore In Minutes - News18
item.description:
Narayana Murthy Loses Rs 1,850 Crore Due to Infosys Stock Slide

Date: January 18, 2025

Source: News18

The recent decline in the Infosys share price has significantly decreased the wealth of co-founder N R Narayana Murthy's family by Rs 1,850 crore.

  • The family’s stake was valued at about Rs 30,300 crore, down from Rs 32,152 crore.
  • Infosys shares fell nearly 6% following the company's Q3 earnings report.
  • Despite an 11% YoY growth in consolidated net profit, investor sentiment weakened due to revised revenue growth guidance.
“Broadly, the comp that we are expecting is 6-8 per cent in India.” - Infosys CFO Jayesh Sanghrajka

This stock slide showcases the volatility in the tech sector and its potential impacts on high-profile investors.

item.title: Top 5 IT firms shed 2,500 jobs in Q3FY25 after a quarter of additions - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Top 5 IT Firms Shed 2,500 Jobs in Q3FY25 After a Quarter of Additions

Date: January 18, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

India’s top five IT firms witnessed a reduction of 2,587 employees in Q3FY25 after a strong hiring quarter, signaling ongoing challenges in the sector despite a cautious revival.

  • The top five IT services companies are Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), Infosys, HCLTech, Wipro, and Tech Mahindra.
  • This quarter marked a seasonal dip in hiring due to typical furloughs.
  • In Q2FY25, these firms had added 15,033 employees, contrasting with the current job cuts.
  • HCLTech and Infosys were the only companies to report an increase in headcount during this quarter.
"On a positive note, these firms added 10,412 employees in 9MFY25, marking a cautious revival after losing over 57,608 employees during the same period in FY24."

This current trend highlights the volatility in the IT job market and the need for firms to adapt to changing demands.

item.title: Buy or sell: Sumeet Bagadia recommends three stocks to buy next week - Mint
item.description:
Sumeet Bagadia Recommends Three Stocks to Buy Next Week

Date: January 14, 2023
Source: Live Mint

Sumeet Bagadia's Stock Picks

In the wake of a decline in the Indian stock market, Sumeet Bagadia from Choice Broking recommends three stocks for investors: Coal India Limited, BSE, and Tata Steel.

Key Points:

  • The Indian stock market closed lower for the third consecutive session.
  • Bagadia indicates a cautious market sentiment with Nifty 50 facing resistance at 23,500 points.
  • Recommended stocks include:
  • 1) Coal India Limited: Buy at ₹387.65, target ₹430, stop loss ₹368.
  • 2) BSE: Buy at ₹5998.75, target ₹6650, stop loss ₹5690.
  • 3) Tata Steel: Buy at ₹130.28, target ₹146, stop loss ₹122.

Notable Quotes:

"Investors should maintain a stock-specific approach. Breaking above the resistance is crucial for improving market sentiments." - Sumeet Bagadia

Conclusion:

Investors are advised to take a cautious yet strategic approach with these stock recommendations as market conditions fluctuate.

item.title: AGR Dues Waiver: In a relief to Jio, Airtel, govt weighs Rs 1 lakh cr Relief for Telcos - DNA India
item.description:
AGR Dues Waiver: In a relief to Jio, Airtel, govt weighs Rs 1 lakh cr Relief for Telcos

Date: January 18, 2025 | Source: DNA India

The government is considering a major proposal to ease the financial burden on telecom companies due to substantial AGR dues following a Supreme Court ruling. This relief could provide over ₹1 lakh crore, primarily benefiting Vodafone Idea, which has been struggling significantly.

  • The proposal includes waiving 50% interest and 100% penalties related to the AGR dues.
  • Vodafone Idea stands to benefit the most, receiving over ₹52,000 crore in relief.
  • Bharti Airtel may see a reduction of nearly ₹38,000 crore in dues.
  • The plan aims to enhance competition in the telecom sector and prevent a duopoly.
  • Part of the relief package may be unveiled during the upcoming February 1 budget announcement.
“The proposal is being discussed at the highest level including the finance ministry, the telecom department and the cabinet secretariat.”

This initiative marks a significant action from the government following the heightened financial struggles in the telecom industry post the 2019 Supreme Court ruling imposing nearly ₹1.47 lakh crore in AGR dues.

item.title: Kalyan Jewellers share price: Why Budget 2025 holds key for this jewellery stock? - Mint
item.description:
Kalyan Jewellers share price: Why Budget 2025 holds key for this jewellery stock?

Date: Not specified Source: LiveMint

After reaching a record high, Kalyan Jewellers' stock is currently experiencing a significant decline. Experts suggest that upcoming government decisions in Budget 2025 could impact the share price positively.

Key Points:

  • Kalyan Jewellers' share price fell by 37% since its all-time high of ₹795.40.
  • Pending customs duty changes on gold could benefit the company's stock price.
  • Market analysts suggest shareholders hold their investments with a stop-loss recommendation.
  • Future price targets for the stock may reach between ₹575 and ₹595 if the trend reverses.
“Investors should remain cautious but optimistic, as the anticipated duty hike could turn into a tailwind for Kalyan Jewellers.” - Sugandha Sachdeva

The anticipated changes in customs duties on gold are viewed as critical to the potential recovery of Kalyan Jewellers' stock price, marking it as a key situation to monitor for investors.
